name: home
story: You are at home, and you are sitting on the couch thinking of great adventure!
nav: press 1 to go to the beach, press 2 to go to the dock and press 3 to go to the launch pad

name: beach
story: You are at the beach, there is sand everywhere and some people running around in the water
nav: press 1 to go home, 2 to go to the dock, or 3 to go to the snack bar

name: launch pad
story: You are at the launch pad, and admire the many fancy ships
nav: Press 1 to go back home, press 2 to go to the moon, and press 3 to go to the space station

name: moon
story: You are on the moon admiring the universe
nav: Press 1 to go to the beach, Press 2 to go to Ragnarok. Press 3 to go to the space mall

name: snack bar
story: You are knackered and need to have some rest
nav: press 1 to go to the beach, press 2 to go home, press 3 to go the pizza hut

name: dock
story: You are on the dock watching spaceships
nav: Press 1  to go home. Press 2 to go to mars. Press 3 to go to repair center

name: Fountain of youth
story: You are at the fountain of youth, you met the space police
nav: Press 1 to go to home 2 to go to amazon jungle 3 to go to space station

name: David jones locker
story: you need the key to get to diamond chest
nav: press 1 to go the dock, 2 to go to the fountain of youth, 3 to go to bermudia triangle

name: Galaxy
story: You are on galaxy and at war with aliens.
nav: Press 1 to go to the space mall, and press 2 to go to home and press 3 to go to amazon jungle.

name: space station
story: Your space ship arrived at the space station, you met some other pirates.
nav: Press 1 to go to home 2 to go to moon 3 to go to mars

name: mars
story: You are on Mars
nav: Press 1 to go to the space station 2 to the alien snack shop 3 pirate bar

name: Alien Headquarters
story: you are on alien headquaters and having party with friends.
nav: Press 1 to go to snack bar, press 2 to go to moon and press 3 to go to the high sea.

name: High sea
story: You are at the high sea, and enjoying the ocean view
nav: press 1 to go to the Amazon jungle, press 2 to explore the seas press 3 to go to the beach

name: wonderland
story: Your friends are missing and you need to find them
nav: press 1 to go to the alien headquarters, press 2 to go home, press 3 to go to the beach

name: bermuda triangle
story: you are at bermuda triangle, you are planning on how to overcome it
nav: press 1 to call space station, 2 to call alien headquater and 3 to go home

name: under the sea
story: in your wreckage under the sea you desperately look for a way out
nav: press 1 to go to the amazon jungle, 2 to go to bermudia triangle, 3 to the fountain of youth

name: ragnorok
story: you and the order space pirates sought to steal the gems in the map
nav: press 1 to go to mars 2 to alien HQ or 3 to the galaxy

name: space mall
story: You are in space mall and you buy some fancy thinks
nav: Press 1 to go to space station. Press 2 to go to bermuda triangle, Press 3 to go to the pirate bar

name: repair center
story: you are on repair centre and just got busy with work.
nav: press 1 to go to go to the alien repair center, press 2 to go to space station and press 3 to go to pirate bar.

name: pirate bar
story: You are at the piirate bar, there is a lot of drinks and rum
nav: Press 1 to go to taco bell, 2 to go to pizza hut, and 3 to go to Davey jones locker

name: jungle fire clearing
story: in your wreckage you struggle to make out of the thick smoke
nav: press 1 to go to the amazon jungle, 2 to go to the repair center, 3 to go to the launch pad

name: alien snack shop
story: while enjoying your rum, you eavesdropped and heard where to find the treasure
nav: press 1 to go to the alien resturant, press 2 to see the alien tech, press 3 to go to taco bell

name: taco bell
story: Ah an amazing taco! You enjoy the delicious and tasty treats!
nav: Press 1 to go to the dock, press 2 to go to the launch pad, press 3 to go to the jungle

name: pizza hut
story: you are at pizza hut and enjoying pineapple on it.
nav: press 1 to go to bermuda triangle, press 2 to go alien snack shop and press 3 to go to beach.

name: Amazon jungle
story: your spaceship missed and crashed in the amazon jungle
nav: press 1 to go to fountain of youth, 2 to go to pirate bar or 3 to go to wonder land

name: pirate treasure
story: You found the pirate treasure of the high seas! You win!

name: alien technology
story: You found the lost alien technology, you win!

name: underwater prison
story: You are trapped in the underwater prison, you lose!

name: alien resturant
story: You are worried that the aliens want to eat you! You lose!
